name: IceCream Mealts
description:
IceCream Mealts is a simple 2D game, the goal is to save as fast as you can all the IceCream.

Be carefull for fast clicking, some Bomb will be dropped and if you hit will subtract 5 points on your total score.

*This game is 100% working for PC and Mobile user*
**This game is made for IceCream Jam**
